content:
[Prev][Next][Index]

Lab Assignment due week of 13 February

  • To: Multiple recipients of list <ics1c@UCI.EDU>
  • Subject: Lab Assignment due week of 13 February
  • From: ICS 1C Instructional Staff <ics1c@ics.uci.edu>
  • Date: Sun, 12 Feb 1995 01:07:49 -0800 
In keeping with the announcement made in class on Friday, 10 February,
the due date for the completion of ICS 1C Lab Exercise 3 is now 
NOON, Thursday, February 16, 3 days later than originally scheduled.

An updated assignment has replaced the original one at
   http://www.ics.uci.edu/~ics1c/doc/assignment-3.html
which the ICS 1C Schedule links to directly.

In addition, the assignment now includes DETAILED instructions
on submitting your final HTML document.
For your convenience, those instructions are included here.

   Submit your final HTML document by noon, Thursday February 16, by
   using Mosaic to Mail the HTML form of it to ics1c@ics.uci.edu with
   the following "Subject:":
       HW3 -- First_Name Last_Name -- eaxx1234
   where "First_Name Last_Name" is your name and "eaxx1234" is your
   EA login. 

   REMINDER: "Mail to ..." is a selection under Mosaic's "File" button.
   BE SURE TO SET the "Format for mailed document" to HTML,
   the "Subject:" as specified above, and the "Mail To:" entry to go to
   ics1c@ics.uci.edu, BEFORE pressing the "Mail" button.

-- sdf
Stephen Franklin
ICS 1C Instructor

  • Next: Scores on assignments and grades
